about_the_game:
Do you like cute cats?

Come to "Where's my kitty?"! Participate in this grand cat-finding party and use your sharp eyes and smart mind to discover every cat hidden in the party.

[Game Goal]

Find all the cats!

[Gameplay]

Try to find all the hidden cute cats in the shortest time, catch them, and enjoy the fun of discovering cats.

[Unique Scene]

From rural areas to neighborhoods, from markets to New Year, you can find cute cats hidden in various scenes. Discover the cats in each scene.

[The Strongest Brain]

Through different scenes, exercise your brain, improve your observation skills, find hidden cats, and hone the strongest brain!

[Many postures]

Each cat hides in different postures, find them and feel the magic of cats.

【Feel the Cat】

Each cat hidden in the scene is unique. Find them, listen to their calls and experience the charm of cats.

Are you ready to cuddle your cat?

Are you ready to hug the cat? Download "Where's my kitty?" now and start a warm cat-finding journey.

name: Where's my kitty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB +
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Do you like playing hide and seek with cats? Come and find them.
